alert.note: Alert for Eastern Walsh County; Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 3:24AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Marshall, western Kittson, eastern Walsh and eastern Pembina Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 324 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hamilton to near St. Thomas to Minto. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Warsaw and Oakwood around 335 AM CDT. Bowesmont, Drayton and Robbin around 340 AM CDT. Joliette and Pembina around 345 AM CDT. Mattson, Big Woods and St. Vincent around 350 AM CDT. Humboldt, Hallock and Northcote around 400 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include American Crystal Sugar. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 164 and 215. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
